DOC.brief_summary: Aims : To assess pelvic floor muscle ( PFM ) strength woman stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) urgency urinary incontinence ( UUI ) . Methods : 51 woman prospectively divide two group , accord symptom SUI ( G1 = 22 ) UUI ( G2 = 29 ) . Demographic data , number Pads/ 24 hour , number micturitions/ 24 hour nocturia , delay time urgent void ( i.e. , time period urgent void could voluntarily postpone ) , number parity vaginal delivery obtain use clinical questionnaire . Objective urine loss evaluate 60-min Pad Test . Subjective [ urine stream interruption test ( UST ) , visual survey perineal contraction transvaginal digital palpation ] objective ( vaginal manometry ) evaluation PFM perform patient .
DOC.brief_title: Pelvic Floor Muscle Evaluation Women With Stress Urinary Urgency Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: presence stress urinary urgency incontinence neurological disease previous pelvic surgery diabetes cognitive difficulty vaginal urinary infection
